name: Spacious Full Room in South Boston
description:
Private room with full bed in a 4 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom home. Need to move-in within first 14 days of availability

June Homes provides fully furnished room and apartments in prime locations.

You will need to sign a membership agreement with June Homes.

The space
This bright, crisp, modern gallery-like home is nestled in South Boston – just blocks away from Old Harbor. The residence provides a balanced design with modern paint finishes mixed with pops of color and ikat prints. Every piece of decor has been hand-selected for this property lending to a bespoke, comfortable vibe.

You enter the unit through a long corridor that separates the kitchen and living room while the bedrooms that are in the front. The kitchen has been fully renovated with new appliances and has a breakfast nook for two.
